api.ui.base

Interface AbstractWindow

  • All Superinterfaces:
    WindowConstants, WindowResizeConstants
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomAlert, CustomWindow, EnigmaAlert, EnigmaWindow

    public interface AbstractWindow
extends WindowConstants, WindowResizeConstants
    Une version abstraite d'une fenêtre
    Since:
    4.0 27/12/2019
    Version:
    4.0 27/12/2019
    Author:
    Louka DOZ, Quentin RAMSAMY-AGEORGES
